data.title: Dreams of Dark and Light by Lee, Tanith, Used
data.meta_description: DREAMS OF DARK AND LIGHT: THE GREAT SHORT FICTION . by Lee, Tanith and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Octavo, cloth. First edition. 3957 copies printed. Collects twenty-three stories. 1987 World Fantasy Award nominee for best anthology / collection. Barron (ed), Fantasy Literature 4A-160. Hartwell, 200 Significant SF Books by Women, 1984-2001. A fine copy in very good or better dust jacket with 20 mm closed tear and associated wrinkle at bottom edge of rear panel. (#174620).

Hardcover. Condition: Good. No Jacket. Missing dust jacket; Pages can have notes/highlighting. Spine may show signs of wear. ~ ThriftBooks: Read More, Spend Less 1.55.

Hardcover. Condition: Very good. Hardcover. First Edition. 3957cc. Very good hardback in a very good dustjacket.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. Douglas Smith (illustrator). First edition. first printing. Collects twenty-three of Lee's stories. Forword by Rosemary Hawley Jarman. 3957 copies printed. Fine in fine and bright dust jacket with thin scrape to the rear panel and very light fade to the spine panel. Book.

Cloth. Condition: Very Good Plus. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. First Edition. Octavo in clean, sound jacket. Front flap is not clipped. End papers are beige. Black cloth covered boards with stamped gold lettering along spine. Tightly bound with yellow and black thread. Max Ernest cover paintings front and back. [507 pages].
